alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:37AM CDT until April 20 at 4:55PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Richland and Cass Counties. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. .Snowmelt river flooding to continue. Rate of rise and ultimate crest is uncertain due to rate of ongoing snowmelt runoff and possible rain, snow, and colder temperatures in the forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. Left bank flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 2.7 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
